definitions.title: n.pr. 1. mont.
definitions.body: NE. edge of Great Plain, SW. of Sea of Galilee, on border of Issachar, Zeb. and Napht., mod. Jebel eṭṬûr; cf. Rel:Pal. 331 ff. Burckhardt:Travels, 332 ff. Rob:BR iii. 340 f. Bäd:Pal. Index, s. v. Buhl:Geogr. 108 GACooke:Ency. Bib., s. v.;—´[[ת]]:([[־]])[[הַר]] Ju Jdg 4:6, Jdg 4:12, Jdg 4:14; ´[[ת]]: alone Ho 5:1, Je 46:18, Jos 19:22, Jos 19:34 (P), Ps 89:13 (+ [[חֶרְמוֹן]]); LXX Qabwr (so Euseb:Onom.), but Ho Je Itaburion, and so Jos:Ant. v. 1:22 [84]. BJ iv. 1. 8 [54]. etc. (other Gk. forms v. Cooke:i. c.).

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 8:18 (too far away to be =
Be al.), GFM conj. [[טַבּוּר]] (Jdg 9:37), Bu [[תֵּבֵץ]] (Jdg 9:50); LXX Qabwr.

definitions.title: 3. loc.
definitions.body: Levit. city in Zebulun 1Ch 6:62; appar. = ´[[כְּסֻלּׂת ת]]: Jos 19:12, and perh. ´[[תּ]]: v:Jos 19:22 (in Issachar), LXX Qaxxeia, A LXXL Qabwr.

definitions.title: 4. arbor.
definitions.body: in ´[[אֵלוֹן ת]]: 1Sa 10:3, near Bethel; LXX Qabwr.
